Hi John,

You’re a prominent thought leader in IT, while I’m no more than a beetle on a tree of life. Yet, I would like to help the ecosystem by focusing my task tracker, Pintask, on managing open source projects. Though current trackers like GitHub and Redmine already do a good job, I’m pretty sure everything could be done better, including the task tracking.

Would you mind sparing 30 minutes on Skype to help me understand the problems facing open source projects? I do have some hypotheses, but only your knowledge can verify them.
